snippet: Utah, the only state in the past 40 years to carry out a death sentence by firing squad, is poised to bring back the executions if the state cannot find drugs used in lethal injections.
abstract: Utah, is poised to bring back execution by firing squad if state cannot find the drugs used in lethal injections, which are in short supply across nation.
lead_paragraph: Utah, the only state in the past 40 years to carry out a death sentence by firing squad, is poised to bring back the executions if the state cannot find drugs used in lethal injections.

headline.main: Utah: Governor Is Sent Bill to Restore Executions by Firing Squad as a Backup
headline.print_headline: Utah: Governor Is Sent Bill to Restore Executions by Firing Squad as a Backup
